articles.author: Eleni Courea, SUE ALLAN, Myah Ward
articles.title: Rishi Sunak's wife Akshata Murty steals G20 show as Biden and Trudeau cut lonelier figures - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Downing Street is keen to put Murty — businesswoman and daughter of an Indian IT tycoon — front and center
articles.content:
NEW DELHI Forget Rishi-mania, its Akshata Murty whos stealing the show at the G20.
The U.K. prime ministers wife, who happens to be the daughter of one of the richest men in India, arrived in New De… [+3102 chars]
